overview: Enjoy the unique experience of following Lou Charmelle's passionate private life for an entire year! You will not be left unimpressed... This isn't the first time that Lou has been to the United States. During her numerous trips between Las Vegas and Los Angeles, she has met several actresses with unbridled sexual appetites, and some perverted men... With her own camera, Lou invites you into these unrestricted private encounters! And to think that Lou Charmelle's journey has only just begun...
title: Lou Charmelle: My Fucking Life
